name: Etherym Depth Dweller
text: If this card is in your hand, you can banish this card: (quick effect) banish 1 Etherym monster on your side of the field or in your GY; draw 1 card. If this card is summoned: you can send 1 Sea Serpent monster from your deck to the GY. You can only use either effect of "Etherym Depth Dweller" once per turn.
